survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate employee satisfaction and preferences regarding sustainable office supply procurement practices within the organization.

questions.question_text: How often do you use sustainable office supplies (e.g., recycled paper, refillable pens, biodegradable products) in your daily work?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure frequency. Ensure options are balanced to avoid bias.

script.question_text: How often do you use sustainable office supplies (e.g., recycled paper, refillable pens, biodegradable products) in your daily work?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: Which of the following sustainable office supplies do you currently use? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to identify popular products. Include 'None of the above' for completeness.

questions.question_text: What barriers, if any, do you face in using sustainable office supplies?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture qualitative insights. Keep the text box large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What barriers, if any, do you face in using sustainable office supplies?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of sustainable office supplies in your workplace?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction. Ensure the scale is clearly labeled.

questions.client_notes: Use a simple yes/no/maybe format to gauge interest. Include follow-up questions if positive.
